news_article.title: Funicular Crash Has Jarred Lisbon’s Sense of Itself

news_article.title: After Bolsonaro’s Conviction, Brazil Already Considers His Amnesty
news_article.description: Brazil’s top court sentenced former President Jair Bolsonaro to 27 years in prison. The nation’s Congress is already debating how to free him.
